sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词都有"抛弃，丢弃"之意。
means: discard ： 指把具体的东西抛掉不要，着重扔、丢的动作。
scrap ： 指抛弃过时不再有用的东西。
shed ： 指毛发、皮肤、叶等经过某种自然的过程而脱落。

sentence.Network_en: Einstein had the chutzpah to discard common sense and long-established theory.
sentence.Network_cn: 爱因斯坦敢于抛弃常识和长期公认的理论。

sentence.Network_en: Clean the mussels and discard any that do not close.
sentence.Network_cn: 把贻贝洗干净，凡是合不上口的都扔掉。

sentence.Network_en: Discard the bacon rind and cut each rasher in half.
sentence.Network_cn: 去掉熏肉的外皮，再把每一片熏肉切成两半。

九年级英语单词表 ... roof 屋顶；房顶；顶 discard 丢弃；抛弃 tile 瓦片；瓷砖.
CATIA软件的10个使用技巧 —— 机械英才网 ... Disable 禁用取消,停用 discard 放弃舍弃 dish 下半球面圆碟.
大学英语四级单词集锦 D 开头_百度文库 ... disk n. 圆盘，唱片；磁盘 discard vt. 丢弃，抛弃，遗弃 discharge vt. 释放；排出 n.释放.

list.abs: 论坛列表-... ... (wake up， 激活)，你感觉很饿，于是大哭 (discard Alarm， 解除报警)，但很不争气地撒尿了 OCV，OCR 字符识别，…
DE 丢弃合格 (Discard Eligibility)-----帧中继网络中用来告诉交换机，如果交换机太忙，一个帧可以被丢弃。DE是帧中的一个字段，如 …
top die 上模top discard 锭头废料top flask 上型箱
bottom casting 底注bottom discard 锭尾切头bottom discharge car 底卸式料斗车

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (originally in the sense 'reject (a playing card'): from dis- (expressing removal) + the noun card

entry.def: If you discard something, you get rid of it because you no longer want it or need it.

example.ex: Read the manufacturer's guidelines before discarding the box.
example.tran: 在丢掉盒子前先看一下制造商的使用说明。

means.word_mean: 1. anything that is cast aside or discarded
2. (cards) the act of throwing out a useless card or to failing to follow suit
3. getting rid something that is regarded as useless or undesirable

auth_sentence.content: Remove the quill from inside the body and discard.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Remove the quill from inside the body and discard.

auth_sentence.content: When cool, peel off and discard the skins.
auth_sentence.res_content: When cool, peel off and discard the skins.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When cool, peel off and discard the skins.

auth_sentence.content: Remove from the heat and discard the star anise.
auth_sentence.res_content: Remove from the heat and discard the star anise.

stems_affixes.word_buile: card心脏,一致+inal→心一样的→首要的
card心脏,一致+inal→心一样的→首要的
tarchy快+card心脏,一致+ia病→心跳快的病
dis去掉+card纸片→把[废纸]扔掉→抛弃

sentences.en: We will discard the old books.
sentences.cn: 我们将不再使用这些旧书。

jushi.english: He discards his winter underclothing when weather gets warm.
jushi.chinese: 天暖时他脱掉冬天穿的内衣。

jushi.english: We will discard the old books.
jushi.chinese: 我们将不再使用这些旧书。
